feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.46.2: Translations Updates & Fixes
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix Missing Translations (#2637) Thanks @ecoutinho!

:rocket: Features

  • CI: Update tests to use Ruby 3.3 (#2619) @pglombardo
  • Latest Language String (#2618) @pglombardo
  • Tests: Add test to validate file upload limits (#2612) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.990.0 to 1.991.0 (#2636) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.10 to 2.0.11 (#2624) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.989.0 to 1.990.0 (#2620) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.7 to 3.1.8 (#2615) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump zeitwerk from 2.6.18 to 2.7.0 (#2616) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.46.0 to 0.47.0 (#2614) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.16 to 0.4.17 (#2613) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump debase-ruby_core_source from 3.3.5 to 3.3.6 (#2610) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.988.0 to 1.989.0 (#2609) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.46.2

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.47.0: New Background Worker Dashboard (Admin)
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release bundles a new dashboard for background job monitoring for those running the pglombardo/pwpush-worker container. (Still in Beta).

Available from /admin and directly at /admin/jobs

  • New Background worker Dashboard (Admin) (#2638) @pglombardo
  • Add missing translation keys (#2649) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2648) @pglombardo
  • Remove the Feedback Form (#2640) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.41.0 to 1.41.1 (#2645) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump erb_lint from 0.6.0 to 0.7.0 (#2641) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.17 to 0.5.0 (#2643) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.167.0 to 1.168.0 (#2642) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.47.1: Disable Secret URL Prefetch & Increased Security Logins
entry.content:
This release improves the security of logins. Details in #2651.

Thanks the security firm who pointed out these potential issues.

If I get permission, I'll post their details once all the fixes out. (There are more on the way)

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Disable prefetch on secret URLs (#2650) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Enable increased login security (#2651) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.47.2: New Admin Menu Item, Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Framework Update in 9b9f4e65edeb322a680279fe72c4884f6f50036c
  • Admin: Add admin dashboard to account menu (#2661) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.993.0 to 1.994.0 (#2676) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump googleauth from 1.11.1 to 1.11.2 (#2677) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump execjs from 2.9.1 to 2.10.0 (#2668) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1 (#2663) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.992.0 to 1.993.0 (#2662) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.210.0 to 3.211.0 (#2660) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.168.0 to 1.169.0 (#2653) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.94.0 to 1.95.0 (#2655) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2 (#2657) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump zeitwerk from 2.7.0 to 2.7.1 (#2654) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.991.0 to 1.992.0 (#2652) @dependabot
